snippet: The United States Agriculture Department proposed eliminating restrictions on the use of corn and soybean seeds genetically engineered to resist a common weed killer.
abstract: United States Agriculture Department proposes eliminating restrictions on use of corn and soybean seeds genetically engineered to resist common weed killer, known as 2,4-D.
lead_paragraph: The United States Agriculture Department proposed eliminating restrictions on the use of corn and soybean seeds genetically engineered to resist a common weed killer.

headline.main: Agriculture Department to End Some Restrictions
headline.print_headline: Agriculture Department To End Some Restrictions
